resources.string: Disclamer: Live streaming content is provided by Temple Administration. This application is designed for easy, uninterrupted and ad-free provision for live streaming.
Please start live streaming and wait for at least 10 seconds for live streaming to start.
Question: Why live streaming not started after pressing Media Play button?
Answer: Temple live streaming service sometimes is temporarily down, please check again later.
Question: Why does it take long time to load the live media streaming?
Answer: One or multiple factors can cause this issue, temple live streaming service handling high network requests or internet connectivity is slow.
Question: Why is Sai Baba Temple, Shirdi and Siddhivinayak Temple, Mubmai missing in live streaming links?
Answer: Sorry, both the Temples Live streaming seems to be restricted and available only Temple owned websites/apps.
